title: Head Scarf, from a three-piece set
description: black; one end has narrow bands of cross stitch and applique in red, pink, green and blue ending in 6\" of intricately formed tassels; 5 3/4\"; red, blue and gold with tiny metal beads; other end has a 3/4\" band of embroidery
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
